item.description:
REIKI LEVEL III
Sometimes called the Master level this level works the karmic and spiritual bodies. You will learn the master symbols, receive the master level attunement and learn how to give attunements to others. Reiki Level III will take your Reiki into a whole new level and many people experience great joy and spiritual healing at this level.

$250 for the level. Split up the payment and pay $62.50 per class! (What a DEAL!)

Meets Tuesday, Jan 12th from 7-9pm. Meets every other Tuesday for four class. Jan 12th, Jan 26th, Feb 9th and Feb 23rd.

Class meets at Solstice Healing Arts Center in Medway, MA

Conact Lisa Campion at 508 533-0669 to register. Lisa@lisacampion.com
www.lisacampion.com

group.name: The Metrowest Reiki and Energy Healers Share

item.name: Reiki III Class
